results.definition: any grammatical case other than the nominative
indirect in departing from the accepted or proper way; misleading
examples: gave oblique answers to direct questions

results.definition: a diagonally arranged abdominal muscle on either side of the torso
slanting or inclined in direction or course or position--neither parallel nor perpendicular nor right-angled
examples: the oblique rays of the winter sun
acute and obtuse angles are oblique angles
the axis of an oblique cone is not perpendicular to its base
